svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

parent="1" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="610" y="130" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="610" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zIAE92TZuHxJO3Z7oM7F-12" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.44" y="150" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="409" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zIAE92TZuHxJO3Z7oM7F-13" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="<b>INGESTION LAYER</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zIAE92TZuHxJO3Z7oM7F-14" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.47" y="360" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410" y="400" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zIAE92TZuHxJO3Z7oM7F-16" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=#60a917;strokeColor=#2D7600;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="<ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">WebSocket Client (websocket-client library)<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Tick Parser: {timestamp, symbol, price, qty}<br>&nbsp;</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Data Validation &amp; Cleaning&nbsp;<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Error Handling &amp; Reconnection Logic&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="130" width="600" x="110" y="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-1" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="<b>STORAGE LAYER</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="400" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-2" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=#f0a30a;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#BD7000;" value="<span style="background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; [SQLite Database: market_data.db]&nbsp;<br><ul style=""><li style="">Table: ticks (timestamp, symbol, price, qty)<br><br></li><li style="">Index: (symbol, timestamp) for fast queries<br><br><br>[In-Memory Buffer]<br><br></li><li style="">Pandas DataFrame for active processing<br><br></li><li style="">Size: Last 10,000 ticks per symbol</li></ul></font></span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"></span>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="210" width="600" x="110" y="440" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-5" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.73" y="650" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410.26" y="690" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-6" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="<b>SAMPLING ENGINE</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="690" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-7" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></font><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Time-based resampling: 1s / 1m / 5m<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">OHLCV aggregation:<br><br>Open: first price in interval<br><br>High: max price<br><br>Low: min price<br><br>Close: last price<br><br>Volume: sum of quantities</font><br></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="210" width="600" x="110" y="730" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-8" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.71" y="940" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410.23999999999995" y="980" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-9" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="ANALYTICS ENGINE" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="980" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-37" parent="1" style="shape=table;startSize=30;container=1;collapsible=0;childLayout=tableLayout;fillColor=#d5e8d4;gradientColor=#97d077;strokeColor=#82b366;" value="Core Modules " vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="310" width="600" x="110" y="1020" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-38" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-37" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="600" y="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-39" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-38" style="shape=partialRectangle;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;connectable=0;overflow=hidden;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;pointerEvents=1;fillColor=#60a917;strokeColor=#2D7600;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Regression</font><div><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; OLS hedge ratio</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">statsmodels</font></li></ul></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="300" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle height="100" width="300" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-40" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-38" style="shape=partialRectangle;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;connectable=0;overflow=hidden;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;pointerEvents=1;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Spread Analysis<br></font><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Y - βX</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Rolling spread</font></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="300" x="300" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle height="100" width="300" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-41" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-37" style="shape=tableRow;horizontal=0;startSize=0;swimlaneHead=0;swimlaneBody=0;strokeColor=inherit;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;collapsible=0;dropTarget=0;fillColor=none;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="76" width="600" y="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-42" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-41" style="shape=partialRectangle;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;connectable=0;overflow=hidden;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;pointerEvents=1;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;Stationarity</font><div><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">ADF test</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">p-value check</font></li></ul></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="76" width="300" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle height="76" width="300" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-43" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-41" style="shape=partialRectangle;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;connectable=0;overflow=hidden;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;pointerEvents=1;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Correlation</font><div><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Rolling Pearson</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Window-based</font></li></ul></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="76" width="300" x="300" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle height="76" width="300" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-44" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-37" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="104" width="600" y="206" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-45" parent="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-44" style="shape=partialRectangle;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;connectable=0;overflow=hidden;top=0;left=0;bottom=0;right=0;pointerEvents=1;fillColor=#60a917;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#2D7600;" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;Z-Score</font><div><ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Rolling mean</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Rolling std</font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">&nbsp;Normalization</font></li></ul></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="104" width="300" x="300" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle height="104" width="300" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-47" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.33" y="1330" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="409.85999999999996" y="1370" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-48" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="ALERT SYSTEM" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="1370" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-49" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=light-dark(#CC0000,#83045E);strokeColor=#B20000;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="<ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Rule Engine: IF z-score &gt; threshold THEN alert<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Alert Types: Visual (UI), Console Log<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Configurable Thresholds</font></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="600" x="110" y="1410" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-50" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.67" y="1520" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410.2" y="1560" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-51" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="STREAMLIT FRONTEND" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="1560" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-52" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=light-dark(#6A00FF,#6A00FF);strokeColor=#3700CC;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="<ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">UI Components:<br><br>Sidebar: Controls (symbols, timeframe, rolling window)<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Main Panel:<br><br>- Database Content Viewer<br>- Price Comparison Chart (Plotly)<br>- Spread &amp; Z-Score Chart<br>- Rolling Correlation Chart<br>- Summary Statistics<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Export: Download buttons (CSV)<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Status: Connection indicator, alerts</font></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="240" width="600" x="110" y="1600" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-53" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="409.74" y="1840" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410.27" y="1880" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-54" parent="1" style="rounded=1;shadow=1;fontSize=12;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" value="USER" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="600" x="110" y="1880" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-55" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=light-dark(#6A00FF,#6A00FF);strokeColor=#3700CC;fontColor=#ffffff;" value="<ul><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Traders monitoring pairs<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Researchers analyzing spreads<br><br></font></li><li><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Risk managers tracking volatility</font></li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="600" x="110" y="1920" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-56" edge="1" parent="1" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" height="40" width="600" x="110" y="2070" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="BC-gbwZXl8G4IKcO2355-58" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=light-dark(#6A00FF,#6A00FF);" value="<ul><li>Logging: File + Console (analytics.log)<br><br></li><li>Error Handling: Try-catch with reconnection<br><br></li><li>Configuration: Hardcoded (extensible to config file)</li></ul>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="600" x="110" y="2110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 34px; margin-left: 15px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 195px; height: 1px; padding-top: 89px; margin-left: 15px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 66px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 194px; height: 1px; padding-top: 89px; margin-left: 212px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 66px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

span.font:
[SQLite Database: market_data.db]
Table: ticks (timestamp, symbol, price, qty)
Index: (symbol, timestamp) for fast queries
[In-Memory Buffer]
Pandas DataFrame for active processing
Size: Last 10,000 ticks per symbol

li.font:
OHLCV aggregation:
Open: first price in interval
High: max price
Low: min price
Close: last price
Volume: sum of quantities

li.font:
UI Components:
Sidebar: Controls (symbols, timeframe, rolling window)

Main Panel:
- Database Content Viewer
- Price Comparison Chart (Plotly)
- Spread & Z-Score Chart
- Rolling Correlation Chart
- Summary Statistics
